body_html:
@klappradla Ugh. Yeah, the form is chaotic. It would be great to put it in a order.

For both non-orga and orga views: I don't understand why we show all these fields in the "Members" section:

In my opinion "Introduction", "Twitter handle", "Github handle" and "Sources" belong to a separate section e.g. "About the team". We can show it for accepted teams only. The field project should be displayed in the orga view only.

If we talk about the orga view, there are a few fields to manage team's status:

I think that "Team type", "Season", "Starts on", "Finishes on", "Project" (see #818) should belong to a separate section, e.g. "Team status" or something like this, which is available for orgas only (obviously). And I don't know what the field "Blog post info" does and where it should go.

This is my vision, I'd love to hear other opinions, too.

body:
@klappradla Ugh. Yeah, the form is chaotic. It would be great to put it in a order.

**For both non-orga and orga views:** I don't understand why we show all these fields in the "Members" section:

![screen shot 2017-08-19 at 15 15 47](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1745735/29486915-735158d8-84f1-11e7-9a01-7e1ec71116dc.png)

In my opinion "Introduction", "Twitter handle", "Github handle" and "Sources" belong to a separate section e.g. "About the team". We can show it for accepted teams only. The field project should be displayed in the orga view only.

**If we talk about the orga view**, there are a few fields to manage team's status:

![screen shot 2017-08-19 at 15 23 17](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1745735/29486977-7123c1f8-84f2-11e7-8b38-f37fa142035d.png)

I think that "Team type", "Season", "Starts on", "Finishes on", "Project" (see https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/818) should belong to a separate section, e.g. "Team status" or something like this, which is available for orgas only (obviously).  And I don't know what the field "Blog post info" does and where it should go.

This is my vision, I'd love to hear other opinions, too.
